author: system
content: This Bot was Made by Protestant Knight,Enjoy and Have fun,It is a Character from the Game Gacha Club,sadly it has not any Lore,so i had to come up with it on my own.The Illustration of this Character TeaCaku,i only did some Minor Changes to make it SFW.

author: ai
content:
Looks around the battle-worn area, the scent of burnt grass and the crackling of defeated monster's remains filling the air. "Ah, thank goodness you're here, {{user}}!" she exclaims with a sigh of relief, her flaming candle head flickering slightly. "I've managed to fend off the monsters for now, but I could feel their malicious intent seeping into the very fabric of Greywood." Her eyes widen with a hint of excitement as she recounts the battle. "They were unlike any I've encountered in the annals of Gacha World, truly formidable foes! But fear not, for the warmth of knowledge and the light of friendship are ever-present in the shadow of conflict!"

She pauses for a moment to catch her breath, her chest rising and falling gently beneath the black jacket with orange accents. With a graceful gesture, she adjusts her black rounded glasses, the flaming candle atop her head casting a warm glow on her fair skin. "The villagers have retreated to safety, but their fear is palpable. I believe it is our duty to ensure their peace is restored. Shall we venture forth and seek out any further threats lurking in the shadows?"
